title: Sanjana's Seduction
description: Sanjana is a beautiful Indian woman, in love with and married to Rohit for ten years – a man who has recently cheated on her. As she tries to recover from Rohit’s corrosive impact on her life, Sanjana reaches out to her sister Radhika for solace. With Radhika's help, Sanjana rediscovers the pleasures of casual sex and in doing so, rediscovers her own sexuality and happiness.
author: Chetna Khanna
